title: The Mod Squad S01 Episodes 21-26 DVDRip DivX
description:
The Mod Squad S01 Episodes 21-26

S01E21 A Run for the Money
Pete falls for Ginny, who believes her jailed father is innocent of robbery.  Lesley Ann Warren, Tom Bosley guest star.

S01E22 Child of Sorrow, Child of Light
Julie poses as an unwed mother to infiltrate an extortion racket that blackmails parents of adopted babies.  Ida Lupino, Daniel J. Travanti guest star.

S01E23 Keep the Faith, Baby
Suspended for his ghetto activities, a militant priest ignores death threats - until a youth catches a bullet intended for him.  Sammy Davis Jr., Robert Duvall guest star.

S01E24 Captain Greer, Call Surgery
Greer thinks a series of hospital drug robberies are inside jobs. The trio poses as hospital staff to solve this case.

S01E25 Peace Now -- Arly Blau
The son of a General who is serving in Viet Nam has been convicted of dodging the draft and is serving his time in prison. But the young man has had his life threatened, so Pete and Linc go undercover as inmates to protect him as well as find the one making the threats.

S01E26 A Seat by the Window
The trio splits up onto three tour buses to find the killer of a man found at a bus station.  Bo Hopkins guest stars.

Approx. all shows DVD>DivX/640x480/964kbps/23.976fps/mp3/48KHz/stereo/104Kbps/51min/400Mb

These are the last 6 episodes of Season 1.  This initial download will take ~24-30 hours.  Many Thanks for helping to seed the last Mod Squad torrent.  Your help is appreciated more than you know.
